title: Any Good Ideas for a New Name
body:
Well here's the story.
I had always liked the summoner name I had chosen to use, and it has been my alias for the past 2 years almost in League And some other things too. I liked it; it was unique, different and not completely cringe enducing. I felt like it suited me...
Anyways recently ~~a friend~~ someone I know has pointed out a bunch of flaws in my name and now that is all I see whenever I look at it, so here I am.

Tldr: any good name ideas :P I'm considering changing it to something that directly references a champion in some form.

replies.body:
depends on the champion u play.
who do u like playing?
Orianna Grande or Ahrianna Grande is cool if you're a mid laner
We are even on the AFsKale now. 1 - 1

OverlordThrob
What, I didn't just Google synonyms, this was all my creativity. Very original name.
